pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nando bhagavato mātucchāputto abhirūpo hoti dassanīyo pāsādiko caturaṅgulomako bhagavatā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.1.4: Addasaṃsu kho therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.1.7: Te upagate jānitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.1.8: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā nando sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ dhāressatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.1.9: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, nanda, sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ dhāresī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.1.12: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, nanda, sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ dhāressasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.1.13: Netaṃ, nanda, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.1.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.1.15: “Yo pana bhikkhu sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpeyya atirekaṃ vā, chedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.1.16: Tatridaṃ sugatassa sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ—dīghaso nava vidatthiyo, sugatavidatthiyā; tiriyaṃ cha vidatthiyo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.7: dīghaso nava vidatthiyo, sugatavidatthiyā; tiriyaṃ cha vidatthiyo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.10: karoti vā kārāpeti vā, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.12: Attanā vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.13: Attanā vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.14: Parehi vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.15: Parehi vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.16: Aññassatthāya karoti vā kārāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.17: Aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.10: Uddiṭṭhā kho, āyasmanto, dvenavuti pācittiyā dhammā.
